tuv.seg: Vocational Training Opportunities Scheme
Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna Gairmoideachais
If you are over 21 years of age, unemployed and have been getting certain social welfare payments for at least 6 months you can apply for the Vocational Training and Opportunities Scheme (VTOS)
Cuireann An Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna Ghairmoideachais (SDOG) réimse cúrsaí ar fáil le riachtanais oideachais agus oiliúna daoine dífhostaithe a shásamh
The VTOS scheme provides a range of courses to meet the education and training needs of unemployed people
Má tá 21 bliain slánaithe agat, más dífhostaithe duit agus íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh faoi leith á bhfáil agat le sé mhí anuas ar a laghad, tig leat cur isteach ar an scéim SDOG

It gives participants opportunities to improve their general level of education, gain certification, develop their skills and prepare for employment, self-employment and further education and training

Tugann an scéim deis dóibh siúd a bhíonn páirteach ann feabhas a chur ar leibhéal ginearálta a gcuid oideachais, deimhniúchán a fháil, a gcuid scileanna a fhorbairt agus réiteach a dhéanamh chun fostaíochta, chun féinfhostaíochta agus chun breis oideachais agus oiliúna
VTOS is operated through local Education and Training Boards and is aimed in particular at unemployed people who are early school-leavers
Oibrítear an VTOS trí Bhoird Áitiúla Oideachais agus Oiliúna agus dírítear é go háirithe ar dhaoine dífhostaithe a d’fhág an scoil go luath
Education and Training Boards
Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna
Since 1 July 2013, Education and Training Boards (ETBs) replaced Vocational Educational Committees (VECs)
Ó 1 Iúil 2013, cuirfear Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO) in áit coistí gairmoideachais
All services provided by VECs will continue to be provided by ETBs
Leanfaidh na BOO an uile sheirbhíse soláthartha ag na coistí gairmoideachais a sholáthar
What kinds of courses are available?
Cén cineál cúrsaí atá ar fáil?
The courses range from basic education and training to advanced vocational training and there is a wide choice of subjects
Tá réimse cúrsaí ann ón mbunoideachas agus ón mbunoiliúint aníos go hardoiliúint ghairme. Tá rogha leathan ábhar ar fáil
The courses are full-time, about 30 hours a week (for example, 6 hours a day for 5 days) and can last up to 2 years
Is cúrsaí lánaimseartha atá iontu, tuairim agus 30 uair a' chloig in aghaidh na seachtaine, 6 huaire a' chloig sa ló ar feadh cúig lá, cuir i gcás
Many courses lead to qualifications such as the Junior Certificate, Leaving Certificate and awards at Levels 3, 4, 5 and 6 on the National Framework of Qualifications

Maireann na cúrsaí suas le dhá bhliain, agus is iomaí cúrsa díobh a mbíonn cáilíochtaí ann dá bharr, An Teastas Sóisear, an Ard-Teistiméireacht, agus gradaim ar Leibhéal 3, 4, 5 agus 6 ar an bhFráma Náisiúnta Cáilíochtaí, cuir i gcás
You can find a list of VTOS courses on the Qualifax website
Tá liosta na gcúrsaí DOG ar láithreán gréasáin Qualifax
You may qualify for the VTOS scheme if you are aged 21 years or over and you are:
B'fhéidir go bhfuil tú cáilithe le haghaidh scéim SDOG má tá 21 bliain slán agat agus:
• Getting, Jobseeker’s Benefit or Jobseeker’s Allowance or signing for credits for at least 6 months or
• Má tá Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora á fáil agat, Liúntas Míchumais, Sochar Breoiteachta* nó Pinsean Easláinte le 6 mhí anuas ar a laghad nó
• Getting One-Parent Family Payment, Disability Allowance, Illness Benefit* or Invalidity Pension for at least 6 months or

• Má tá Pinsean na nDall á íoc leat, Liúntas/Sochar na mBan Céile Tréigthe, Pinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Ranníocach), Pinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Neamh-Ranníocach) nó Liúntas Ban Céile na bPríosúnach le 6 mhí anuas ar a laghad (tharlódh go mbeadh coinníollacha i gcás na n-íocaíochtaí seo) nó

• Getting Blind Pension, Deserted Wife’s Allowance/Benefit, Widow's, Widower’s or Surviving Civil Partner’s Contributory Pension, Widow's, Widower’s or Surviving Civil Partner’s Non-Contributory Pension or Prisoner’s Wife’s Allowance for at least 6 months (conditions may apply in the case of these payments) or • A dependent spouse, civil partner or cohabitant of an eligible person
• Más céile pósta/pairtnéar sibhialta/comhchónatheoir tú atá spleách ar dhuine cáilithe le 6 mhí anuas ar a laghad
• A person who received statutory redundancy but who has not been in receipt of a qualifying payment for the required period
• Duine a fuair iomarcaíocht reachtúil ach nach raibh íocaíocht incháilithe á fáil acu don tréimhse riachtanach
Periods spent on FET training courses, Community Employment Schemes, Job Initiative, Youthreach programmes and time in prison can count towards the qualifying period

Is féidir tréimhsí a caitheadh ar chúrsaí oiliúna FET, ar Scéimeanna Fostaíochta Pobail, ar Togra Oibre, ar chláir Youthreach agus seal a caitheadh sa phríosún a chur san áireamh i dtréimhse na cáilíochta
* If you are claiming Illness Benefit, you should contact your local social welfare office about exemption/entitlement to continuation of your Illness Benefit payment

* Má tá Sochar Breoiteachta á éileamh agat, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le d’oifig leasa shóisialaigh sula dtosaíonn tú cúrsa faoin Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna agus Gairmoideachais (SDOG) maidir le leanúint le d’íocaíocht Sochar Breoiteachta a fháil

If you started VTOS before January 2013 and you are getting Jobseeker’s Allowance or Jobseeker’s Benefit, you will get a training allowance at a rate equivalent to the maximum rate of Jobseeker’s Benefit instead of your jobseeker's payment

Má thosaigh tú SDOG roimh Eanáir 2013 agus má tá Liuntas Cuardaitheora Poist nó Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist á fáil agat, tabharfar liúntas oiliúna duit ar ráta a bheas cothrom le huasráta Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist in áit d’íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist

From January 2013, VTOS participants who move from jobseeker's payments will no longer have their new payments increased to the maximum €188 per week, in cases where their jobseeker's payment is less than this

Ó Eanáir 2013, má tá rannpháirtithe SDOG ag bogadh ó íocaíochtaí cuardaitheora poist, ní mhéadófar a n-íocaíochtaí nua suas le €188 sa tseachtain a thuilleadh, i gcásanna inár mbíonn a Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist níos lú ná seo
However, people under 25 will continue to receive a top-up rate of up to €160 per week (any means you have will be deducted from this rate)
Áfach, leanfar ráta breise suas le €160 sa tseachtain á híoc le daoine faoi bhun aois 25 (bainfear aon mhaoin atá agat ón ráta seo)
This will apply to new participants only
Ní bheidh seo i gceist ach i gcás rannpháirtithe nua
Since January 2014, VTOS participants under 26 who move from an age-related reduced rate of Jobseeker’s Allowance will get a top-up rate of €160 per week - this will apply to new participants only
Ó Eanáir 2014, má tá rannpháirtithe SDOG faoi bhun aois 26 ag bogadh ó ráta laghdaithe aoischoibhneasa Liúntais Cuardaitheora Poist, gheobhaidh siad ráta breise suas le €160 sa tseachtain
Generally, your entitlement to a VTOS training allowance will not be reassessed if there is a change to your circumstances (including means)
Is iondúil nach ndénafar do theidlíocht i gcomhair liúntais oiliúna VTOS a athmheasúnú má thagann athrú ar do chúinsí (lena n-áirítear acmhainn)
VTOS training allowance and work: If you are returning to your course for a second year, you will continue to get your VTOS allowance during the summer months
Liúntas oiliúna SDOG agus obair: Má bheidh tú ag filleadh ar do chúrsa don dara bliain as a chéile, leanfaidh tú le do liúntas SDOG a fháil i rith mhíonna an tsamhraidh
You can also take up full-time work during the summer months and your VTOS payment is not affected
Anuas air sin, féadfaidh tú glacadh le hobair lánaimseartha i rith mhíonna an tsamhraidh agus ní dhéantar difear do d’íocaíocht SDOG
VTOS training allowance and dependants: If you want a dependant adult or child added to your payment you must notify the Department of Social Protection (DSP)
Liúntas oiliúna SDOG agus cleithiúnaithe: Más mian leat go gcuirfear duine fásta nó leanbh cleithiúnach le d’íocaíocht, ní mór duit fógra a thabhairt don Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí (RCS)
DSP will then notify the ETB of any changes to your VTOS training allowance
Cuirfidh an RCS an BOO ar an eolas, ansin, ar aon athruithe a dhéanfar do do liúntas oiliúna SDOG
Other social welfare payments
Íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh eile
If you are getting one of the other eligible social welfare payments you will continue to get your payment in the normal way
Má tá ceann de na híocaíochtaí eile incháilithe leasa shóisialaigh á fáil agat, leanfaidh tú le d’íocaíocht a fháil ar an ngnáthbhealach
You must continue to meet the conditions of your payment
Ní mór duit leanúint agus coinníollacha d’íocaíochta a shásamh
If you are on a reduced means-tested payment it will be increased to the maximum amount for your situation while you are participating on VTOS
Má tá íocaíocht laghdaithe ar a ndéantar tástáil mhaoine á fáil agat, méadófar í seo chuig an méid uasta do do chás fad a bhíonn tú ag glacadh páirte ar VTOS
You will also continue to get your social welfare secondary benefits
Anuas air sin, leanfaidh tú le do chuid sochair thánaisteacha leasa shóisialaigh a fháil
Since 2010, people on PLC courses who are getting VTOS allowances are no longer eligible for student support grants
Ó 2010 i leith, níl daoine atá ag tabhairt faoi chúrsaí PLC a bhfuil liúntais VTOS á bhfáil acu i dteideal deontais tacaíochta do mhic léinn a fháil a thuilleadh
However, this does not affect any entitlement they may have to exemption from college fees or student contributions
Ní dhéanann seo aon difear, áfach, d’aon teidlíocht a bheadh acu mar gheall ar dhíolúine ó tháillí coláiste nó ó ranníocaíochtaí mic léinn
There are no fees for VTOS courses and you will get free books and materials at the start of the course
Níl aon táille ar na cúrsaí SDOG agus tabharfar leabhair agus ábhair duit in aisce i dtús an chúrsa
Depending on your individual circumstances you may be eligible for the following:
De réir mar atá do chuid cúinsí féin, tharlódh go mbeifeá i dteideal na nithe seo a leanas:
• Free childcare place for your child under the Childcare Employment and Training Support (CETS) scheme,
• Áit chúraim leanaí in aisce dod’ leanbh faoin Scéim Tacaíochta um Oiliúint agus um Fhostaíocht Cúram Leanaí (CETS)
• A training bonus payment, if you have been getting an eligible social welfare payment for at least 12 months before starting the VTOS scheme
• Bónas oiliúna €20 má bhí íocaíocht cháilithe leasa shóisialaigh á híoc leat le 12 mí ar a laghad sular thosaigh tú an scéim SDOG
It was announced in Budget 2014, from 1 January 2014, the €20 bonus payment to long-term unemployed VTOS participants will end. This only applies to new participants
I mBuiséad 2014, fógraíodh go gcuirfear deireadh leis an íocaíocht bónas €20 do rannpháirtithe SDOG dífhostaithe fadtéarmacha i 2014
More detailed information about VTOS is available on the Department of Social Protection's website
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi SDOG ar fáil ar shuíomh gréasáin na Roinne Coimirce Sóisialaí
VTOS training allowances are not taxable
Níl liúntais oiliúna SDOG inchánaithe
You can participate in the VTOS scheme in one of the following ways; you can be either:
Tig leat páirt a ghlacadh i scéimeanna SDOG i gceann de na bealaí seo a leanas; seo é an rogha atá agat:
• A core VTOS student attending a VTOS centre or adult education centre or
• A bheith i do dhalta SDOG lánpháirteach a bheas ag freastal ar ionad SDOG nó ar ionad oideachais le haghaidh daoine fásta nó
• A dispersed VTOS student, usually attending a Post-Leaving Certificate course in a further education college
• A bheith i do dhalta SDOG as láthair a dhéanfaidh gnáthfhreastal ar chúrsa Iar-Ard-Teistiméireachta i gcoláiste ardoideachais
There is a list of frequently asked questions about VTOS on the Qualifax website
Tá liosta ceisteanna a chuirtear go minic maidir leis na SDOG le fáil ar shuíomh idirlín Qualifax
Contact the VTOS co-ordinator at your local VTOS centre to find out more about the VTOS courses available
Déan teagmháil le comhordaitheoir SDOG san ionad SDOG atá agat féin go háitiúil le breis eolais a fháil faoi na cúrsaí SDOG atá ar fáil
